metadata.title: CVE-2022-1789 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
With shadow paging enabled, the INVPCID instruction results in a call tokvm_mmu_invpcid_gva. If INVPCID is executed with CR0.PG=0, the invlpgcallback is not set and the result is a NULL pointer dereference.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1789` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-122-generic - 5.4.0-122.138
linux-image-5.4.0-122-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-122.138
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-122-generic - 5.4.0-122.138
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-122-lowlatency - 5.4.0-122.138
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1071-kvm - 5.4.0-1071.76
No subscription required
